fields.name: msgVersion
fields.description: Message version (0x01 for this version)

fields.name: tmirCoeff
fields.description: Target misleading information risk (TMIR) [%MI/epoch], coefficient integer number of base 10 scientific notation (see e.g. plPos field)

fields.name: tmirExp
fields.description: Target misleading information risk (TMIR) [%MI/epoch], exponent integer number of base 10 scientific notation (see e.g. plPos field)

fields.name: plPosValid
fields.description:
Position protection level validity
• 0: Invalid (Protection level should not be used)
• 1: Protection level is valid

fields.name: plPosFrame
fields.description:
Position protection level frame:
• 0: Invalid (not possible to calculate frame conversion)
• 1: North-East-Down
• 2: Longitudinal-Lateral-Vertical
• 3: HorizSemiMajorAxis-HorizSemiMinorAxis-Vertical

fields.name: plVelValid
fields.description:
Velocity protection level validity
• 0: Invalid (Protection level should not be used)
• 1: Protection level is valid

fields.name: plVelFrame
fields.description:
Velocity protection level frame:
• 0: Invalid (not possible to calculate frame conversion)
• 1: North-East-Down
• 2: Longitudinal-Lateral-Vertical
• 3: HorizSemiMajorAxis-HorizSemiMinorAxis-Vertical

fields.name: plTimeValid
fields.description:
Time protection level validity
• 0: Invalid (Protection level should not be used)
• 1: Protection level is valid

fields.name: plPosInvalidityReason
fields.description:
Position protection level invalidity reason
• 0: Not available
• 1-29: Solution not trustworthy
• 30-100: PL not verified for this receiver configuration

fields.name: plVelInvalidityReason
fields.description:
Velocity protection level invalidity reason
• 0: Not available
• 1-29: Solution not trustworthy
• 30-100: PL not verified for this receiver configuration

fields.name: plTimeInvalidityReason
fields.description:
Time protection level invalidity reason
• 0: Not available
• 1-29: Solution not trustworthy
• 30-100: PL not verified for this receiver configuration

fields.name: reserved0
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: iTow
fields.description: GPS time of week

fields.name: plPos1
fields.description: First axis of position protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plPosFrame (see plPosFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plPos2
fields.description: Second axis of position protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plPosFrame (see plPosFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plPos3
fields.description: Third axis of position protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plPosFrame (see plPosFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plVel1
fields.description: First axis of velocity protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plVelFrame (see plVelFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plVel2
fields.description: Second axis of velocity protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plVelFrame (see plVelFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plVel3
fields.description: Third axis of velocity protection level value, given in coordinate frame of plVelFrame (see plVelFrame field for value order), w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: plPosHorizOrient
fields.description: Orientation of HorizSemiMajorAxis (see plPosFrame) of horizontal ellipse position protection level (clockwise degrees from true North), if plPosFrame==3; zero otherwise.

fields.name: plVelHorizOrient
fields.description: Orientation of HorizSemiMajorAxis (see plVelFrame) of horizontal ellipse velocity protection level (clockwise degrees from true North), if plVelFrame==3; zero otherwise.

fields.name: plTime
fields.description: Time protection level value, w.r.t. the given target misleading information risk (TMIR) of [tmirCoeff * 10^(tmirExp)]

fields.name: reserved1
fields.description: Reserved
